definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: However, she started to write her essay only one day before the deadline.
sentences.chinese: 然而，她临到截止日期的前一天才开始动笔。

sentences.english: I was now nearly sick from inanition, having taken so little the day before.
sentences.chinese: 由于前一天吃得大少，这时我简直饿坏了。

sentences.english: The day before the game, he came over to our house in Suwon.
sentences.chinese: 比赛前一天他跑到了我们在水原的家。

sentences.english: But the previous day the Senate threw down the gauntlet to China.
sentences.chinese: 但是前一天，参议院对中国发起了挑战。

sentences.english: She said she encountered one of the attackers a day before the incident.
sentences.chinese: 她说她在遇袭前一天曾经遇见过其中一个施暴者。

sentences.english: Before Wang's lecture, to sang songs for a whole night with my undergraduate students.
sentences.chinese: 听王老师讲座前一天，跟本科生去唱了一晚的歌儿。

sentences.english: The day before the trail, Mr. Dawson sent his best suit to the laundry.
sentences.chinese: 审判前一天，道森先生将他最好的西服送到洗衣房。

sentences.english: The day before the Riverdale Meet, Coach called me over.
sentences.chinese: 在里维代尔运动会的前一天，教练把我叫了过去。

sentences.english: But the previous day, as rain fell, he had visited the site where Rosenberg was shot.
sentences.chinese: 但前一天，他冒雨查看了罗森博格遇害的地点。

sentences.english: Gracie was even treated to a day of spa treatments the day before the party.
sentences.chinese: 而在宴会前一天，小格雷西还做了一天的水疗。

sentences.english: I forgot to wind up my alarm clock the night before.
sentences.chinese: 前一天晚上，我忘记给闹钟上发条。

sentences.english: He arrived one day before Christmas, nineteen thirty-three.
sentences.chinese: 他到达纽约市是在1933年圣诞节的前一天。

sentences.english: The day before the broadcast, he met with Rosenberg’s son Eduardo.
sentences.chinese: 播出的前一天，他会见了罗森博格的儿子爱德华多。

sentences.english: Every day learns from that which preceded it.
It was the day before we expected to see Treasure Island.
sentences.chinese: 那天是我们预计到达金银岛的前一天。

sentences.english: The chase down at Chertsey the previous night had not lasted long.
sentences.chinese: 前一天夜里切特赛的追捕并没有持续多长时间。

definition: at dawn/at first light/first thing in the morning
